question: Which among the following does not come under the purview of information security in the banking system?
option1: Protection of investment in information assets and to the actual information thereon
option2: Availability of assets for use whenever and wherever required
option3: Adequate care of the human factor in IT implementation
option4: Provision of low cost Information security to customers
answer: Provision of low cost Information security to customers
explanation: There is no question of cost , when it comes to data security in the Banks
